#labels remod,cubescript,commands,player
=Player commands=
*legend:*
  * *perm* - permission: 1 - all players, 2 - masters, 3 admins only
  * *[ ]* - required parameter
  * *( )* - not required parameter  
  
|| Command || Perm || Description ||
|| #help (cmd) || 1 || Shows info about command or list of server commands ||
|| #pm [cn] [txt] || 1 || Sends private message to player ||
|| #persist [1|0] || 2 || Dont shufle teams ||
|| #specall [1|0] || 2 || Spectate or unspectate all players ||
|| #restart || 2 || Restart map ||
|| #getip [cn] || 2 || Show player ip ||
|| #version || 1 || Show software version ||
|| #mute [cn] [0|1] || 2 || Mute player ||
|| #time [min] || 2 || Set time limit for current round ||
|| #gtime (min) || 3 || Set time limit for every next round ||
|| #uptime || 1 || Show server uptime ||
|| #disc [cn] || 3 || Disconenct player with readson "normal" ||
|| #unmute [cn] || 3 || Unmute player ||
